original_text: And the children of Israel went into the midst of the sea upon the dry ground: and the waters were a wall unto them on their right hand, and on their left.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손이 바다 가운데를 육지로 걸어가고 물은 그들의 좌우에 벽이 되니

sentences.original_text: And the children of Israel went into the midst of the sea
and the waters were a wall unto them on their right hand
